testcase.name: Verify if user can search Item using searchbox & select
testcase.system-out: Given user opens the "chrome" browser.......................................passed Given user enters the url "http://automationpractice.com/index.php".........passed Given user is on the application login page.................................passed And user clicks on Sign in link.............................................passed And an existing user enters an email address as "testuser789@gmail.com".....passed And an existing user enters an password as "windows@123"....................passed And existing user clicks on SignIn button...................................passed Then user lands on the My Account page......................................passed And user clicks on Dresses mega menu........................................passed And user clicks on Summer Dresses mega menu.................................passed And Summer Dresses page opens with text as "SUMMER DRESSES "................passed Then user enters "Dress" into the Global Item searchbox.....................passed And user selects Printed Chiffon Item from the list.........................passed Then "Printed Chiffon Dress" is displayed in Details view...................passed
